data.message: Please get rid of messenger app. I want to be able to msg people straight through Facebook not some other app

replies.message: Hey Lizzy. We want to make everyday messaging with the most important people in your life fast, reliable, useful and fun, and we're confident Messenger is the way to do that. We hope you’ll try it and let us know what you think. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1uFk239 -Hailey

I honestly hate it. I never works it shows I get a msg and when I open it I can't see. Can Facebook make that work again on the regular app and have those people who need messenger to still be able to use it?
I cannot remove it I do not know how.....    Please help get this off my I pad........I
Can you guys make a button that disables from people calling you ? I shouldn't have to block one person at a time . That's insane. I just don't want me phone ringing all the time.
